action.name: Set value
action.param: "ERROR: You have been disconnected from the host!"

action.name: Log
action.param: "Error: You have been disconnected from the host!"&Multiplayer.LeaveReason

action.name: Set value
action.param: "ERROR: "&replace(replace(Multiplayer.ErrorMessage, "[", ""), "]", "")&newline&"Press F12 and click on 'Console' for more info"&newline&"PS: server is probably offline"

action.name: Log
action.param: "ERROR: "&replace(replace(Multiplayer.ErrorMessage, "[", ""), "]", "")&newline&"Press F12 and click on 'Console' for more info"
